text: Peter H Beveridge was an English diver who competed for England. ==Diving career== Beveridge competed in the 3 Metres Springboard at the 1934 British Empire Games in London. ==Personal life== He was a police inspector and government official by trade and lived in Lewisham. ==References== Category:1899 births Category:English male divers Category:Divers at the 1934 British Empire Games Category:Year of death missing
title: Peter Beveridge (diver)
